matrix-project.description:
> Deploy war file to tomcat instance. based on the BUILD_TYPE
> Please note deployment can be done to DEV, UAT or PROD environment.
> BUILD_TYPE parameter must be "dev", "uat" or "prod"
> Deployment wars are picked up from the latest invoicebinder build.

[Process]
- deploy ROOT war. (webinvoicesignup)
- deploy invoicebinder war.
- copy invoicebinder.war to pack location for download.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#1. add host key for tomcat server in the jenkins build machine mkdir -p ~/.ssh ssh-keyscan -H $SSH_SERVER >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
#2. deploy ROOT application scp -v -i /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/ibkey $BUILD_DEPLOYMENT_LATEST/$BUILD_TYPE/ROOT.war $SSH_USER@$SSH_SERVER:$TOMCAT_WEBAPPS/ROOT.war
#3. deploy DEMO application scp -v -i /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/ibkey $BUILD_DEPLOYMENT_LATEST/$BUILD_TYPE/demo.war $SSH_USER@$SSH_SERVER:$TOMCAT_WEBAPPS/demo.war

#1. cleanup and create a download folder for war file on the remote server if not exists ssh -v -i /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/ibkey $SSH_USER@$SSH_SERVER 'rm -R -f '$TOMCAT_WEBAPPS'/downloads' ssh -v -i /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/ibkey $SSH_USER@$SSH_SERVER 'mkdir -p '$TOMCAT_WEBAPPS'/downloads'
#2. deploy downloadable invoicebinder package application. scp -v -i /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/ibkey $BUILD_DEPLOYMENT_LATEST/$BUILD_TYPE/invoicebinder.war $SSH_USER@$SSH_SERVER:$TOMCAT_WEBAPPS'/downloads/invoicebinder.war'

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultSubject: Deployment Results (InvoiceBinder) SUCCESS - Build = ${ENV, var="BUILD_VERSION_MAJOR"}.${ENV, var="BUILD_VERSION_MINOR"}.${ENV, var="BUILD_NUMBER"}, Build Type = $BUILD_TYPE
hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
InvoiceBinder build ${ENV, var="BUILD_VERSION_MAJOR"}.${ENV, var="BUILD_VERSION_MINOR"}.${ENV, var="BUILD_NUMBER"} has been deployed successfully.
This deployment is for configuration $BUILD_TYPE
Regards, Builder (Jenkins)
